heroData.intro: Well, if you ask me who I am? The answer would go something like this: a person who loves JavaScript and is now exploring TypeScript, I`m all about learning and helping out. I`m excited to pitch in on open-source projects and support others in building awesome websites. With a big dose of enthusiasm and a hunger for new experiences, I`m ready to tackle whatever comes my way in the world of software development.

aboutMeData.intro: My journey commenced as a full-stack developer, with proficiency in React.js for frontend development and Node.js for backend tasks. Over time, a transition was made towards specialization in React.js, leading to the current role as a full-time frontend developer. Additionally, a gradual transition to Next.js is underway, alongside continued contributions as a part-time backend developer, utilizing expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript to address minor bugs and enhance overall system functionality.

servicesData.frontendData: Began in Aug 2020 as full-stack web dev with React.js & JS. Transitioned to focus on React.js with TypeScript. Learning Next.js. Exp in Redux, React-Query. Mastering HTML, CSS, SCSS. Explored Material UI, Bootstrap, AntDesign, Syncfusion, Tailwind CSS, DevExtreme for data projects. Excited about DevExtreme`s data features.
servicesData.backendData: Started as a full stack developer, specializing in API development with Node.js, MongoDB, and MySQL. Shifted focus to frontend due to job demands. Currently exploring Nest.js with TypeScript for backend tasks.
servicesData.fullstackData: Although my career commenced as a full-stack developer, project requirements prompted me to pivot and intensify my focus on frontend development. Presently, I am adept at contributing to both frontend and backend development as per project demands, leveraging my proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript.
